title: Facebook Lead Generation
snippet:
I am looking for an expert in Facebook Lead Generation to generate quality leads for me on Facebook.  You will be well compensated and You must have a track record showing your success.

To be 100% clear - if you are just scraping info from Facebook and sending me a spreadsheet DO NOT BOTHER TO APPLY.  I want leads that are ready to talk to me and my business.  

If you are the person to do this for me - I want to talk to you.
